entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OnNavigatingFrom called even if not navigating back on swipe in IOS #25699
  • MAUI Geolocation from a known address #25698
  • [testing] Some builds hang when running iOS samples or template tests #25695
  • Splashscreen and Dark/Light theme behavior changed on Android #25693
  • Blazor Hybrid Webview cannot be force reloaded for urls containing query parameters with a dot (.) #25689
  • Can we get an answer please? #25688
  • SSlStream Authentication failing in .NET MAUI Android app whereas same is working in Xamarin.forms #25687
  • [WinUI] Editor width is not updated when setting styles for native view #25684
  • 8.0.92 make app size bigger #25683
  • OnNavigatedFrom is not triggered as expected from FlyoutPage.Detail #25682
  • [MacCatalyst] When using TabbedPage TabBar is not visible #25679
    .NET 9 SR1

Closed

  • BoxView with no dimension given in a grid is not displayed (unexpected behavior when migrating from Xamarin) #25442
  • [Android] Apps compiled for 15.0 / 35 default displaying as Edge to Edge #24742
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [ci] New templates failing on signing #25525
    Backlog
  • Maui Android deployment fails with error XABLD7023 #25583
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #25694
  • [iOS, 9.0 Preview 6] Build process of iOS projects with SkiaSharp hangs up in Release configuration in Visual Studio 17.11.0 Preview 4.0 #23776
  • Items in a Listview header don't receive gesture events #18793
  • [iOS] CarouselView content renders behind tab bar #17817
    Backlog
  • OnNavigatedFrom is not triggered as expected from FlyoutPage.Detail #25680

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip invalidation on propagation (#25652) #25696
    .NET 8 SR10
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Windows] Fix for the screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage #25690
    community ✨
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    community ✨
  • Fix minor online API docs warnings #25685
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Better exception for using viewCell with collection View #25681
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Merged

  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR10
  • Skip invalidation on propagation #25652
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr10] Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25677

Updated

  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area-testing
  • Remove `MeasureInvalidated` bubble-up mechanism / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    community ✨
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    community ✨
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
  • [iOS] Only invalidate ancestors upon MeasureInvalidated #25465
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add analyzer for TestCase and missing Category #23465
    area-testing, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Add MSBuild glob for Windows Assets #23314
    area-single-project, platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR2
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR2
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR2
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    .NET 9 SR2
